name: Dust Bunny Tamagotchi
description:
Submission for /AGDG/ gamejam. https://itch.io/jam/agdggj02

Take care of a small dust bunny creature without letting it get too small or too large!

Be sure to pet him too!

Red bar is Happiness

Green bar is Hunger

Blue bar is size/cleanliness.

Now runs in background!

Now with sound!

To do:

  • Create death animations
  • ask if player wants to start over
  • more evolutions
  • Add save and load functions
